aboutUs.title: What We Do
aboutUs.subtitle: Right solutions for each phase of your project.

items.title: Architectural Shop Drawings
items.desc: Clear, accurate, and buildable for the site.

items.title: MEP Shop Drawings
items.desc: Detailed coordination for piping, duct, and electrical.

quality.title: Quality Commitment
quality.body: We put reliability first: quality you can safely use, on-time delivery, optimized cost, and information security—backed by real-world experience and practical proposals.

cta.title: Open to Partnerships
cta.desc: Tell us about your project or request a quote.

content.content_1: We are pleased to extend our congratulations on your company’s continued prosperity. We would also like to express our sincere gratitude for your special patronage.
content.content_2: Our company, M&E Akebono Co., Ltd, is mainly engaged in the preparation of construction shop drawings, equipment design, construction, and coordination drawings in Japan.
content.content_3: Our staff consists of proactive and creative professionals in the fields of architecture and equipment. Based on over 20 years of practical experience, we create 'drawings that can be used on-site'.
content.content_4: We provide and deliver these drawings. At present, we are looking for partners, so please feel free to contact us if your company has any projects. We would be delighted to become your collaborator.
content.content_5:
Depending on the type of work, we can use different software for drawing production. Please refer to the following:
・ Architectural shop drawings (CAD Soft … JWW, AutoCAD)
・ Equipment shop drawings (CAD Soft … Cad Cape, Tf@st, NYK Systems Rebro 2011)
・ Equipment design drawings (CAD Soft … JWW, AutoCAD) --> created from sketch drawings
・ Drawing tracing (CAD Soft … JWW, AutoCAD)
・ Fabrication drawings for unit baths, kitchens, and toilets (CAD Soft … other software)
・ Equipment 3D drawings (BIM compatible) (CAD Soft … NYK Systems Rebro)

footerContent: We have a proven track record and extensive experience in many construction projects with Shimizu Corporation in Japan, giving our clients peace of mind and confidence when placing orders with us.
